note:
#pwLC #pwME in southwest Oregon. I had a 20-year career in corporate software before becoming ill in 2020. I majored in biology and when I have good days I enjoy slowly expanding my knowledge of the ecosystem around me; the career path not taken.

Before Long Covid I milked my dairy goats, had a flock of Black Copper Maran chickens, enjoyed backpacking and tent-camping with my husband on weekends, and was a member of my county's Search and Rescue team.
